SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY REPORT

PART 2: ACCOUNT SUMMARY
During the reporting period, total debits amounted to 10,737.35 and total credits amounted to 11,497.70. There were 5 debit transactions and 5 credit transactions. Unique creditors: 1; unique debtors: 2. Transactions observed: ACH, card, cash, crypto, wire.
